mean_cn: adj. 工程上的，工程方面的；  n. 工程（学），工程师行业，操纵，管理
mean_en: the work of designing and creating large structures (such as roads and bridges) or new products or systems by using scientific methods
word_etyma: engineer工程师 + ing…学 → engineering 工程学
sentence: All the workers are trying to solve the engineering problem.
sentence_trans: 所有工人都尝试着解决这个工程问题。
